metadata.title: CVE-2016-3104 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: mongod in MongoDB 2.6, when using 2.4-style users, and 2.4 allow remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption and processtermination) by leveraging in-memory database representation whenauthenticating against a non-existent database.

criterions.comment: mongodb package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
